captions.text:
- I don't think sushi
can be improved by bacon.
- I actually expect this to be bad.
- Just grab it, you don't have the skills.

- OK, and this looks
like a McDonalds' bacon.

- Might have ruined bacon
for me a little bit.
- It's like a breakfast sushi roll.
- It does look like maple syrup.

- Smoother, but it's not,
like, the flavor of bacon.

- The fat really dulls
the flavor of everything.

- Oh, I only eat bananas
to be a good person.

- Umm, that kinda smells
like, like breakfast.

- I figure this is gonna
taste like (bleep).
- It has that umami thing going on.
- There isn't enough of this in the world.
- Like at the end of most drunk nights,
I just wanna make bacon anyway.
- You taste it when you breathe out?

- It's like, makes it
just easier to drink.
- It's putting hair on my chest.

- It makes it more
special than the average
- This is making me question everything.
- Life's got you down, just take a swig
- If you're willin' to get drunk,
why not get drunk off bacon?

- [Both] I like it, I love
it, I'll eat some more of it.

I just want you to know
this is a very special

time in my life, and I'm
just so glad I can be
- [Girl in black] Are you falling in love?
- [Guy in blue] Yeah, I am in love.

comments.text:
In my opinion, there isn't anything wrong with bacon. There also isn't 
really anything special about it. It's salty, meaty, but definitely not as 
good as beef or other meats. The good thing about it? It has a HUGE 
cultural and social obsession attached to it, so that makes it awesome in 
its own way. ﻿
